sentences.en: Accidents are happening with increasing frequency.
sentences.cn: 事故发生得越来越频繁.

sentences.en: Amplifier self - oscillates at a frequency depending on the velocity of the fluid.
sentences.cn: 放大器自激振荡的频率就取决于流体的速度.

sentences.en: Businesses come and go with alarming frequency .
sentences.cn: 商家开张停业惊人地频繁。

sentences.en: Businesses come and go with alarming frequency.
sentences.cn: 商家开张停业惊人地频繁。

sentences.en: Its frequency response has to be flat over the whole audio range.
sentences.cn: 它的频率响应在整个音频范围内有所下降.

sentences.en: Jewellers'windows gleamed along the path with remarkable frequency.
sentences.cn: 珠宝店明亮的橱窗沿途可见.

sentences.en: Side effects from prescribed drugs are being reported with increasing frequency (= more and more often ) .
sentences.cn: 处方药的副作用正越来越频繁地被报道出来。

sentences.en: Sound waves, light waves, and radio waves have a certain frequency, or number of waves per second.
sentences.cn: 声波、光波或无线电波等都有特定的频率，或者说是每秒的波数。

sentences.en: Speech is made up of sound waves that vary in frequency and intensity.
sentences.cn: 语音是由不同频率和强度的声波组成的。

sentences.en: The Doppler frequency can be obtained as a heterodyne or beat effect.
sentences.cn: 由于外差或频差效应,能够得到多普勒频率.

sentences.en: The drug can reduce the frequency and severity of attacks.
sentences.cn: 这种药能降低发病次数和严重程度.

sentences.en: The frequency of Kara's phone calls increased rapidly.
sentences.cn: 卡拉的电话飞速增多。

sentences.en: the frequency of serious road accidents
sentences.cn: 重大道路交通事故的发生率

sentences.en: The relative frequency of fraternal twins has halved since 1950.
sentences.cn: 自1950年以来，异卵双胞胎的相对出生率下降了一半。

sentences.en: The reversion frequency is increased by the addition of mutagents.
sentences.cn: 逆转的频率靠加入诱发变因素而增加.

sentences.en: The tanks broke down with increasing frequency.
sentences.cn: 坦克越来越频繁地熄火。

sentences.en: Their frequency of use both justifies and requires the memorization.
sentences.cn: 频繁的使用需要记忆,也促进了记忆.

sentences.en: This led to corner cutting and - with surprising frequency - falsification of data.
sentences.cn: 其结果导致投机取巧了,伪造数据资料,其频繁程度使人吃惊.

sentences.en: This station broadcasts on three different frequencies.
sentences.cn: 这家电台以三种不同的频率广播。

sentences.en: With this restricted frequency range it is not applicable to hydrocarbons.
sentences.cn: 这个较紧缩的频率范围不适用于烃类.

sentences.en: You can't hear waves of such a high frequency.
sentences.cn: 如此高频率的声波是无法听到的。

words.tran_cn: 频繁的；时常发生的；惯常的
频繁地，经常地；时常，屡次

phrases.tran_cn: 频分复用；分频多路传输
频率响应；录放幅频响应
自然频率，固有频率；本盏率
共振频率；谐振频率；共鸣频率
频率；振动频率；波动频率

trans.tran_cn: 频繁性，[数][物]频率，次数，频率分布
trans.tran_en: the number of times that something happens within a particular period of time or within a particular group of people
